text: {| |} HMS Meadowsweet was a that served with the Royal Navy during the Second World War. She served as an ocean escort in the Battle of the Atlantic.Friedman, Norman p. 341 ==References== ===Sources=== * * * Category:1942 ships Category:Ships built in Bristol Category:World War II corvettes of the United Kingdom Category:Flower-class corvettes of the Royal Navy
title: HMS Meadowsweet (K144)
